suggestions.name: Protein-Packed Oatmeal with Egg Whites
suggestions.description: A hearty breakfast combining creamy oats with egg whites for extra protein, topped with banana and cinnamon.
instructions: Combine oats and almond milk in a saucepan over medium heat
Cook for 3-4 minutes until oats begin to soften
Whisk egg whites in a separate bowl
Slowly pour egg whites into the oatmeal while stirring constantly
Continue cooking for 2-3 minutes until egg whites are fully incorporated and cooked
Slice banana and add to the oatmeal
Add cinnamon and vanilla extract, stir well
Serve hot in a bowl

suggestions.name: Savory Egg and Oat Breakfast Bowl
suggestions.description: A savory twist on oatmeal with eggs, spinach and avocado for a nutritious high-protein breakfast.
instructions: Cook oats in chicken broth over medium heat for 5 minutes until creamy
In a separate pan, fry the eggs to your preference (sunny-side up recommended)
Wilt the spinach in the same pan for 1 minute after removing eggs
Slice the avocado
Place cooked oats in a bowl, top with wilted spinach
Add the fried eggs and sliced avocado on top
Season with salt and pepper

suggestions.name: Egg White Oatmeal Pancakes
suggestions.description: Fluffy pancakes made with oats and egg whites for a protein-rich breakfast, topped with fresh berries.
instructions: Blend oats in a blender until they become a flour-like consistency
Add egg whites, half banana, baking powder, vanilla extract, and cinnamon to the blender
Blend until smooth to form a pancake batter
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and lightly coat with cooking spray
Pour about 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake
Cook for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form on top
Flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes
Serve topped with blueberries and remaining sliced banana
